children.value: is a standard interface for interactions with methods and events described in

. These interactions are generally concerned with the colony network as a whole. This includes operations like getting a count of all colonies on the network, querying for information about a skill, or registering an ENS label for a user.
Get the address of a Colony for the specified id of a deployed colony contract.
Name of the Colony to get
. The address of the given Colony contract
Returns an initialized ColonyClient for the specified id of a deployed colony contract.
Name of the Colony to get
associated with the given Colony contract
Returns an initialized ColonyClient for the contract at address
Address of a deployed Colony contract
associated with the given Colony contract
Gets the Meta Colony as an initialized ColonyClient
All callers return promises which resolve to an object containing the given return values.
Check whether or not ENS supports a contract interface. A supported contract interface implements
The hashed ID of the contract interface as specified in ERC-165.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
A boolean indicating whether or not the contract interface is supported.
Get the address of a registered ENS label. This function will return an empty address if an ENS label has not been registered.
The hached ENS label that will be checked.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The address associated with the ENS label.
Get the ID of a child skill.
The numberic ID of the skill that will be checked.
The index of the child skill array to be checked.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The ID of the child skill.
Get the colony contract address for a colony.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The address of the colony contract.
Get the total number of colonies on the network. The return value is also the ID of the last colony created.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
Get the address of the resolver contract for a specific colony version.
The version number of the colony contract.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The address of the resolver contract.
Get the latest colony contract version. This is the version used to create all new colonies.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The version number of the latest colony contract.
Get the inverse amount of the network fee. If the fee is 1% (or 0.01), the inverse amount will be 100.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The inverse amount of the network fee.
Get the Meta Colony contract address.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The address of the Meta Colony contract.
Get the ID of a parent skill.
The numberic ID of the skill that will be checked.
The index of the parent skill array to be checked.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The ID of the parent skill.
Get the address of the OrbitDB database associaated with a user profile.
The hashed ENS label that was registered for the user.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The path of the OrbitDB database associated with the user profile.
Get the total number of users that are assigned a network recovery role.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The total number of users that are assigned a colony recovery role.
Get the ID of the root global skill.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The ID of the root global skill.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The total number of parent skills.
The total number of child skills.
A boolean indicating whether or not the skill is a global skill.
Get the total number of global and local skills in the network.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The total number of global and local skills in the network.
Get the token locking contract address.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The address of the token locking contract.
Check whether or not an address is a colony contract.
The address that will be checked.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
A boolean indicating whether or not an address is a colony contract.
Check whether or not the network is in recovery mode.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
A boolean indicating whether or not the network is in recovery mode.
Lookup the registed ENS label for an address. This function will return an empty string if the address does not have a registered ENS label.
A promise which resolves to an object containing the following properties:
The ENS label associated with the address.
